meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels read left to right as 02271, with the rightmost white wheel showing 0 for the tenths place (2271.0 m³). The red needle clearly points to the 0.04 mark on the circular dial. The 0.00 mark is assumed at 12 o'clock, and the 0.04 mark is physically located at 6 o'clock (180 degrees).
